.json æ–‡ä»¶ä¸èƒ½å¢åŠ æ³¨é‡Š

{
  "name": "es7-react-js-snippets",
  "displayName": "ES7+ React/Redux/React-Native snippets",
  "description": "Extensions for React, React-Native and Redux in JS/TS with ES7+ syntax. Customizable. Built-in integration with prettier.",
  "version": "4.4.3",
  "publisher": "dsznajder",
  "icon": "images/logo.png",
  "browser": "./lib/index.js",
  "main": "./lib/index.js",
  "keywords": [
    "snippets",
    "react",
    "redux",
    "react-native",
    "customizable",
    "javascript",
    "typescript",
    "prettier"
  ],
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/dsznajder/vscode-es7-javascript-react-snippets"
  },
  "engines": {
    "vscode": "^1.60.0"
  },
  // https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/extension-manifest#combining-extension-contributions
  "categories": ["Snippets"],
  "extensionKind": ["ui", "workspace"],
  "capabilities": {
    "virtualWorkspaces": true,
    "untrustedWorkspaces": {
      "supported": true
    }
  },
  // https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/extension-manifest
  "activationEvents": [
    "onLanguage:typescript",
    "onLanguage:typescriptReact",
    "onLanguage:javascript",
    "onLanguage:javascriptReact",
    "onCommand:reactSnippets.search",
    "onStartupFinished"
  ],
  "contributes": {
    // æŸ¥è¯¢å‘½ä»¤
    "commands": [
      {
        "command": "reactSnippets.search",
        "title": "Snippet search"
      }
    ],
    // ç»‘å®šå¿«æ·é”®
    "keybindings": [
      {
        "command": "reactSnippets.search",
        "key": "ctrl+alt+r",
        "mac": "shift+cmd+r",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
      }
    ],
    // é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
    "configuration": {
      "title": "ES React/React-Native/Redux snippets",
      "properties": {
        // æ˜¯å¦å¯ç”¨prettieræ ¼å¼ä»£ç 
        "reactSnippets.settings.prettierEnabled": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "markdownDescription": "[EXPERIMENTAL: MIGHT NOT WORK]: Integrate prettier settings with code generated from snippets.",
          "default": false
        },
        // æ˜¯å¦åœ¨é¡¶éƒ¨å¼•å…¥ react importReactOnTop
        "reactSnippets.settings.importReactOnTop": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "markdownDescription": "Controls if snippets should add `import React from 'react';` at the top of components.\nUse if you have React +17 and use jsx transform.",
          "default": true
        },
        // æ˜¯å¦ä½¿ç”¨typescript
        "reactSnippets.settings.typescript": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "markdownDescription": "Controls if React components have typescript Props typing.",
          "default": true
        },
        // è¯­è¨€èŒƒå›´
        "reactSnippets.settings.languageScopes": {
          "type": "string",
          "markdownDescription": "defines the language scopes for which the snippets will be available.\nUse comma separated values.\nFor example: `typescript,typescriptreact,javascript,javascriptreact`",
          "default": "typescript,typescriptreact,javascript,javascriptreact"
        },
        // props/state. ä½¿ç”¨typeè¿˜æ˜¯interface
        "reactSnippets.settings.typescriptPropsStatePrefix": {
          "type": "string",
          "markdownDescription": "Controls which prefix for typescript snippets should use for props/state.",
          "default": "type",
          "enum": ["type", "interface"]
        }
      }
    },
    "snippets": [
      // jsè¯­è¨€
      {
        "language": "javascript",
        "path": "./lib/snippets/generated.json"
      },
      // jsxè¯­è¨€
      {
        "language": "javascriptreact",
        "path": "./lib/snippets/generated.json"
      },
      // tsè¯­è¨€
      {
        "language": "typescript",
        "path": "./lib/snippets/generated.json"
      },
      // tsxè¯­è¨€
      {
        "language": "typescriptreact",
        "path": "./lib/snippets/generated.json"
      }
    ]
  },
  "scripts": {
    "vscode:prepublish": "yarn compile",
    "compile": "rm -rf lib; tsc -p ./ --noEmit false --module commonjs --outDir lib",
    "compile:dev": "rm -rf lib; tsc -p ./ --noEmit false --module commonjs --outDir lib",
    "lint": "eslint --ext .js,.ts,.tsx ./src/",
    "watch": "tsc -watch -p ./",
    "typescript": "tsc --noEmit"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "prettier": "2.5.1"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "prettier": "^2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "prettier": "2.5.1",
    "typescript": "4.5.5"
  },
  // prettier  é…ç½®
  "prettier": {
    "bracketSameLine": false,
    "bracketSpacing": true,
    "printWidth": 80,
    "semi": true,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "tabWidth": 2,
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "useTabs": false,
    "endOfLine": "auto"
  }
}

import {
  exportDefault,
  innerComponent,
  innerComponentReturn,
  propsStateInterface,
  propsTypeInterface,
  react,
  reactComponent,
  reactPureComponent,
  reduxComponentExport,
} from "./sharedSnippets";

// src/sourceSnippets/typescript.ts
// æºç é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://github.com/841660202/vscode-react-javascript-snippets/blob/185bb91a0b692c54136663464e8225872c434637/src/sourceSnippets/typescript.ts#L175
const typescriptReactClassComponentRedux: TypescriptSnippet = {
  key: "typescriptReactClassComponentRedux",
  prefix: "tsrcredux",
  body: [
    "import { connect } from 'react-redux'",
    ...reactComponent, // æºç  https://github.com/841660202/vscode-react-javascript-snippets/blob/185bb91a0b692c54136663464e8225872c434637/src/sourceSnippets/sharedSnippets.ts#L18 // å¤ç”¨ import React, { Component } from 'react'
    "",
    ...propsStateInterface, // æºç  https://github.com/841660202/vscode-react-javascript-snippets/blob/185bb91a0b692c54136663464e8225872c434637/src/sourceSnippets/sharedSnippets.ts#L52 type Props = {} type State = {}
    `export class ${Placeholders.FileName} extends Component<Props, State> {`,
    "  state = {}",
    "",
    ...innerComponentReturn, // æºç  https://github.com/841660202/vscode-react-javascript-snippets/blob/185bb91a0b692c54136663464e8225872c434637/src/sourceSnippets/sharedSnippets.ts#L40
    "}",
    ...reduxComponentExport, // æºç  https://github.com/841660202/vscode-react-javascript-snippets/blob/185bb91a0b692c54136663464e8225872c434637/src/sourceSnippets/sharedSnippets.ts#L25
  ],
  description:
    "Creates a React component class with connected redux and ES7 module system and TypeScript interfaces",
};

import { connect } from "react-redux";
import React, { Component } from "react";

type Props = {};

type State = {};

export class tsrcredux/**æ–‡ä»¶å */ extends Component<Props, State> {
  state = {};

  render() {
    return <div>tsrcreduxx<!--æ–‡ä»¶å --></div>;
  }
}

const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({});

const mapDispatchToProps = {};

export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(tsrcreduxx/**æ–‡ä»¶å */);
